function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of detailed POE studies for health club facilities","Impact":"Inability to assess and mitigate potential health risks in health club facilities","Mitigation":"Conducting further diagnostic POE studies to gather quantitative data on health club facilities","Technologies":"Sensors, data collection software","People":"Users of health club facilities, facility managers, public health authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, health organizations"},{"Description":"Use of schematics instead of accurate drawings","Impact":"Inaccurate visualization of facility layout, potentially leading to incorrect assessment","Mitigation":"Utilizing more accurate drawings or digital modeling for visualization","Technologies":"3D modeling software, digital surveying tools","People":"Researchers, architects, facility managers","Owner":"Research institutions, architecture firms"},{"Description":"Limited descriptive material based on quantitative methods","Impact":"Inability to assess the true impact of built facilities on public health","Mitigation":"Implementing quantitative research methods for detailed facility assessment","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, research survey platforms","People":"Researchers, public health authorities, facility managers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
